title: Clinical Trial
description: Encapsulates information regarding a clinical trial.

lead_organization_study_id.description: Trial identifier used by lead organization, e.g. Center for Experimental Therapeutics Program (CTEP) ID or Industry Sponsored ID.  This is usually a short identifier. Example: E4412.

trial_description.description: A brief description of the clinical trial.

trial_organization.description: Name of the primary organization that oversees the clinical trial. Example: ECOG-ACRIN, SWOG, etc.

participants.description:
The collection of participants in this clinical trial.
 `cimac_participant_id` - participant identifier assigned by the CIMAC-CIDC Network. Example: CIMAC-1234.
